fn.p: Edited by: Hongyue Dang, Xiamen University, China
Reviewed by: Angelina Lo Giudice, Consiglio Nazionale Delle Ricerche (CNR), Italy; Brivaela Moriceau, UMR6539 Laboratoire des Sciences de L'Environnement Marin (LEMAR), France
This article was submitted to Aquatic Microbiology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Microbiology
